text: This is a list of notable sailboat designers and manufacturers, which are described by an article in English Wikipedia. Sailboat design and manufacturing is done by a number of companies and groups. ==Notable designers== Sailboat designer articles in Wikipedia: *Carl Alberg *John Alden *Robert W. Ball *John Beavor-Webb *Frank Bethwaite *Edward Burgess *Starling Burgess *George Cassian *Tony Castro *Britton Chance Jr. *William Ion Belton Crealock *Raymond Creekmore *George Harding Cuthbertson *Laurie Davidson *Greg Elliott *Mark Ellis *Bruce Farr *William Fife *Group Finot *Germán Frers *John Laurent Giles *Ted Gozzard *Nathanael Greene Herreshoff *George Hinterhoeller *Ron Holland *Ted Hood *John Illingworth *Ted Irwin *Rodney Johnstone *Juan Kouyoumdjian *Bill Langan *Bill Lee *Ben Lexcen *Bill Luders *John Marples *Gregory C.
